title: How to check my phone radiation level - Quora

response.answer_text: Higher SAR value denotes higher the radiation levels. To check for the SAR value, Dial *#07# USSD code in your mobile phone. 1.6W/Kg is the threshold value for the radiation level. If SAR value is less than 1.6 W/Kg, It is ok to use that phone.

In most of the android phones you can check received signal strength indicator (RSSI) at below path. Go to the Settings app > About phone >SIM status > Signal Strength. You will see numbers expressed in dBm (decibel milliwatts)  You can also check SAR(specific absorption rate) value of your phone by dialing : *#07#
